mapper.sql: id, name, password, status, nick_icon, nick_name, gender, province, city, area, street, address, create_time, update_time, del_tag
mapper.insert: insert into t_backend_user (id, name, password, status, nick_icon, nick_name, gender, province, city, area, street, address, create_time, update_time, del_tag ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nickIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{street,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{delTag,jdbcType=CHAR} )

mapper.update:
update t_backend_user
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
nick_icon = #{nickIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER},

city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
del_tag = #{delTag,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_backend_user set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, nick_icon = #{nickIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, street = #{street,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, del_tag = #{delTag,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select a.id , a.name ,a.password ,a.create_time as createTime from t_backend_user a where a.name = #{name}
